sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { cart, fav, logoText, user } from "../assets"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; import UserContext from "../context/userContext"; import { FaAlgolia } from "react-icons/fa"; export const Header = () => { const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const [cartQty, setCartQty] = useState(cartItems.cartArray); useEffect(() => { setCartQty(cartItems.cartArray.length); }, [cartItems.cartArray]); const toggleMenu = () => { document.getElementById("menu").classList.toggle("hidden"); }; const auth = useContext(UserContext); console.log(auth.user); return (
Home Pages Shop Element Blog
{/* 606701 */}
  • Home
  • Pages
  • Shop
  • Element
  • Blog
{cartQty}
View Cart
View Favorites
{auth.user ? <>Login : <>Logout}
{cartQty}
); };
